snippet: Jack Mannino, a star witness at a trial of a man with whom he is accused of robbing a bank last year, recalled a string of criminal enterprises that all ended the same way — with his arrest.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on Jack Mannino, star witness at a bank robbery trial, who takes the stand only to have the prosecution push him into admitting not only a lifelong string of criminal enterprises, but fact that all of them ended the same way--with his arrest.
lead_paragraph: Jack Mannino, a star witness at a trial of a man with whom he is accused of robbing a bank last year, recalled a string of criminal enterprises that all ended the same way — with his arrest.

headline.seo: A Career Criminal Started Young, but ‘Never Got Away with Anything’
headline.main: A Career Criminal Started Young, but ‘Never Got Away With Anything’
headline.print_headline: A Career Criminal Started Young, but ‘Never Got Away With Anything’
